description: The Greenhouse Gas Emissions Inventory details the estimated New York State emissions releases from fuel combustion.  The dataset includes emissions for each year from 1990 through the present (currently 2010), broken down by the sector (Residential/Commercial/Industrial, Electricity generation, and Transportation).  The dataset also includes a fuel type breakdown, also by sector, for the current year.

metadata.attribution: New York State Energy Research and Development Authority

name: Greenhouse Gas Emissions From Fuel Combustion, Million Metric Tons: Beginning 1990
